remarks: Scalar multiplication in a structure product.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
statement:
prdsbas.p $e |- P = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsbas.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsbas.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. W ) $.
prdsbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
prdsbas.i $e |- ( ph -> dom R = I ) $.
prdsvsca.k $e |- K = ( Base ` S ) $.
prdsvsca.m $e |- .x. = ( .s ` P ) $.
prdsvsca $p |- ( ph -> .x. = ( f e. K , g e. B |-> ( x e. I |-> ( f ( .s ` ( R ` x ) ) ( g ` x ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d B f g x $.
$d I f g x $.
$d K f g $.
$d P f g x $.
$d R f g x $.
$d S f g x $.
$d f g ph x $.
